Uses of Interface
com.cloudera.oryx.kmeans.common.KMeansEvalStrategy

  • Packages that use KMeansEvalStrategy 
    Package Description
    com.cloudera.oryx.kmeans.common  
    com.cloudera.oryx.kmeans.computation.evaluate  

    • Uses of KMeansEvalStrategy in com.cloudera.oryx.kmeans.common

      Classes in com.cloudera.oryx.kmeans.common that implement KMeansEvalStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FixedKEvalStrategy
      For a given set of runs, choose the lowest cost solution for a fixed value of K.
      class  LowCostStableEvalStrategy 
      class  MostStableEvalStrategy
      Chooses the best clustering based on the lowest-cost solution found for the most stable value of K, where the stability of K is determined by taking the mean or the median of one of the main cluster stability metric (either Van Dongen or the Variation of Information.)

    • Uses of KMeansEvalStrategy in com.cloudera.oryx.kmeans.computation.evaluate

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      KMeansEvalStrategy EvaluationSettings.getEvalStrategy()

      Constructor and Description
